rules_text:
Multikicker {2} [i](You may pay an additional {2} any number of times as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Choose one, then choose another for each time Mystical Menagerie was kicked –
• Put a 4/4 green Rhino creature token with trample onto the battlefield.
• Put two 1/1 blue Bird creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.
• Put three 1/1 green Pygmy Beast creature tokens onto the battlefield.
